pages.text: Using the $(l:creating_life/spirit_instiller)Spirit Instiller$(/l) you are able to breathe life into $(l:creating_life/mob_heads)Mob Head$(/l).

pages.title: Creation
pages.text: To create a Creature Spawn you need a $(l:creating_life/mob_heads)Mob Head$(/l) of the Creature you want to resurrect and a bit of $(creating_life/fading#vegetal)Vegetal$(/l).

pages.title: Hatching
pages.text: The energies in the created Spawn need a bit of time to mature, almost like an egg: to hatch it you have to place it down and wait. Depending on the creature within, it may be reasonably quick, or take ages.$(br2)Placing them on top of specific Blocks seems to speed up that process or halt it entirely.

pages.title: Conceiling
pages.text: Tip: The Addition of $(creating_life/failing#neolith)Neolith$(/l) seems to completely overpower the energies of that Spawns Creature, making the content of the resulting Spawn unrecognizable, until hatched.
